fields.Title of Contribution (if applicable): EMPOWER your Teaching in Times of Challenge: A Webinar Series
fields.Description/Abstract:
This was a series of Webinars followed by Facebook Live Sessions to help teachers across the country to meet the challenges of remote and hybrid teaching by using guided inquiry/cognitive apprenticeship approaches.  The series began April 30 and concluded on July 30.

Sustaining a Learning Community During Challenging Times Share
Apr 30, 2020
